title: Proclamation of Gulf of America Day for February 9, 2025
summary: This proclamation establishes February 9, 2025, as Gulf of America Day, marking the inaugural celebration of this day. It follows the signing of Executive Order 14172 on January 20, 2025, which aimed to restore names that honor significant aspects of American history. The proclamation recognizes the importance of the Gulf of America and encourages appreciation for its cultural and environmental significance.
